dct_description_sm: met groote verbeterings van mieuws geteeckent en ujtgegeven door Nicolaus Visscher ; C.J. Visscher excud.
Coordinates approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.
Bar scale on map given in "Uren gaens".
Shows topography, drainage, territories of the twelve tribes of Israel, travel routes, places of historical interest.
Includes illustrations of a compass rose, sea monster, shekel coins, and ships.
Decorative title cartouche with illustrations of cherubs.
4 pictorial vignettes below map: [Holy men and biblical objects].
